jd: Hello,Hope you are doing well!!My name is Deepali Jha and I am a Staffing Specialist at Sibitalent. I am reaching out to you on an exciting job opportunity with one of our clients. Job Title: Lead Data EngineerLocation: Scottsdale, AZ (Hybrid-Scottsdale, AZ (on site 3 or more days per week))Visa: No CPT, H1BDuration: 6+ Months Primary Skills: SQL Job DescriptionThe CVS Health Rebates team is looking for a Lead Data Engineer to assist us in solutioning architecture as we transform the Rebate Processing System from its legacy platform. This person will assist our software engineers in rearchitecting, transforming, and designing data pipelines. Level/rate: Senior Required skills:• 5-7 years of data engineering experience• Capable of leading other data engineers• 3+ years of experience with Apache Airflow and/or Composer• 3+ years of experience with DataProc and/or Spark• 5+ years of experience with CI/CD• Experience producing architecture solutions using Composer and Spark• Experience in large-scale batch processing with cloud services• Ability to collaborate with architects to solve problems and provide data engineering solutions• Familiarity with databases and SQL• Familiarity with at least one OOP language, Java preferred• Familiarity with GCP, GKE, and Cloud IAM Desired skills: Map Reduce, Spark Streaming, PySpark, Hive, HDFS, Kafka, Redis, Sqoop, Oozie, IBM Data Sage, Spring Batch
